ques: Did you hear about the accident that _________ed on the highway?
The police conducted a raid and made a _________ at the illegal gambling den.
The stars in the night sky _________d brilliantly.

The event had to be _________d due to inclement weather.
He managed to _________ the opportunity and secure the deal.
The noisy construction work began to _________ her from her studies.
The two siblings strongly _________ each other in appearance.
She had to _________ the stubborn stains from the kitchen counter.
She couldn't help but _________ her coworker's success.
She decided to _________ a table at the restaurant for their anniversary dinner.
He used a scanner to _________ the documents into digital format.
She was always willing to _________ her knowledge with others.
I _________ to finish the project by the end of the week.
The sudden noise outside the window served to _________ her attention.
The police had to _________ the suspect before he could escape.
He began to _________ the way he was treated by his boss.
The hotel requires guests to _________ rooms in advance.
They decided to _________ the meeting until next week.
He diligently _________ed the floors until they shone.
They _________ to visit their family during the holidays.

The crystal chandelier _________d with a thousand tiny lights.
The security personnel carefully _________ed the crowd for any suspicious activity.
The hikers had to _________ a treacherous mountain pass.
It's strange how coincidences can _________ at the right moment.
They decided to _________ the cost of the trip equally.
It's not healthy to _________ the achievements of others.
She quickly _________ed through the pages of the book to find the relevant information.
He tried to _________ himself by focusing on a book.
The cat managed to _________ the busy street safely.
The antique chair closely _________ed those from the same period.

Her eyes would _________ with excitement when she talked about her dreams.
The wedding had to be _________d because of a family emergency.
He had to _________ a spot in the crowded parking lot.
The detective was determined to solve the art _________ case.
She tried to _________ the moment and express her feelings.
The siblings had a close bond and would often _________ their secrets.
Sometimes unexpected opportunities can _________ when you least expect them.
She didn't _________ to offend anyone with her comments.
The two friends agreed to _________ the desert on a daring adventure.
The fresh snow on the ground seemed to _________ in the sunlight.
He wanted to _________ his success story to inspire others.
Her handwriting oddly _________ed her mother's.
After gardening, she needed to _________ the dirt from her hands.
The computer program can automatically _________ and detect viruses.
The soldiers were ordered to _________ the enemy's stronghold.
The unexpected phone call served to _________ her while she was working.
She wondered if the meeting would _________ as planned.
The museum showcased a collection of ancient _________s.
They couldn't hide their _________ment when they were overlooked for promotion.
She chose to _________ her vacation until after the busy season.

The sculpture was designed to _________ a famous work of art.
Sometimes it's necessary to _________ plans for unforeseen circumstances.

The entrepreneur was quick to _________ the emerging market trends.
It's important not to let distractions _________ you from your goals.
Do you _________ to pursue a career in medicine?
He couldn't shake the feeling of _________ment toward his former friend.
The gemstone's facets caught the light and _________d beautifully.
They made a _________ation for a guided tour of the national park.
